resources.string: In php we learned how to use PHP code to manipulate websites with data. This included: Manipulating variables, creating arrays, taking data from SQL databases, etc. Some projects included displaying and modifying data on websites.\n

In this class we learned how to create good navigation and page layout for websites. This knowledge can be used in other UI designs such as android apps as well. Many projects included creating websites from scratch. It also taught us to think and make the project reflect the theme and needs of the purchaser.\n

We learned to manipulate, insert, and delete data and tables in SQL based databases. We worked with both SQL and MySQL databases. Projects included creating and editing existing databases and tables. We also learned how to use joins and other methods of data combination.
